section.title: Java API Documentation
section.para: This folder contains various API documentation sets.

listitem.para: For MMBase users the bridge is the most important and stable (as in 'least likely to change in future version') part of MMBase. When making new functionality based on MMBase these are strongly recommended, this subset of classes in the org.mmbase package should be enough.

para.ulink: Javadoc of all classes in mmbase.jar and of all 'applications'

listitem.para: The 'applications' are those supported by the MMBase community (like email, dove, taglib etc), but not all 'contributions'.
